item.title: What Asia's Love-Hate Relationship With Cryptocurrency Means For Investors
item.description: What Asia’s Love-Hate Relationship With Cryptocurrency Means For Investors [<href=“https://www.forbes.com/sites/forbesnycouncil/2019/05/08/what-asias-love-hate-relationship-with-cryptocurrency-means-for-investors/” target="_blank>read more] - 2018 was the year of cryptocurrency, to hear the news tell it. Even as bitcoin, Ethereum and others rose to unprecedented heights, fell and fell some more, one thing is now certain: Love them or hate them, blockchain and cryptocurrencies are here to stay.If y… [+12814 chars]
